channel.title: virtualbox on Morgoth
channel.description: Recent content in virtualbox on Morgoth

item.title: Virtualbox
item.description: Virtualbox 虚拟化工具virtualbox. vboxmanage vm // 导入ova $ vboxmanage import win7.ova // 添加host网络 $ vboxmanage modifyvm "win764" --nic1 hostonly --hostonlyadapter1 vboxnet0 // 添加bridge网络 $ vboxmanage modifyvm "Win732" --nic2 bridged --bridgeadapter2 docker_gwbridge // 重命名v
